## CredentialTableEntry interface

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.

This is used internally by [DataStoreJson](./data-store-json.datastorejson.md) to represent a Verifiable Credential in a way that facilitates querying using the [IDataStoreORM](./core-types.idatastoreorm.md) interface.

This API may change in future versions without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface CredentialTableEntry
```
